name: Project Intercalaris
overview: Project Intercalaris is a successor to Project Battlefield. This time the action takes place on an alien planet. As a scout the player must deal with the rebellion of alien races, introducing mostly fighting with hostile mechanized units. The game is divided into four stages with the possibility of selecting standard and advanced level area. Using the map requires finding an electronic map. The player may find many useful items scattered around the base. The game features one novelty - an action menu allowing the player to take, view, abandon and use items. A curiosity is the ability to remotely control a robot. The screen size can be adjusted depending on the Amiga power, additionally it's possible to turn off the floor and ceiling textures.
